mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, c.like_check, c.memberNo, b.profileImg FROM board a JOIN member b ON a.memberNo = b.memberNo LEFT JOIN likes c ON a.boardNo = c.boardNo AND c.memberNo = #{memberNo} WHERE a.memberNo IN ( SELECT followingMemberNo FROM following WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo} AND followingCheck = 1 ) AND a.delYn = 'N'

SELECT a.*, IFNULL(b.like_check, 0) AS like_check, m.memberId,m.profileImg, IFNULL(f.followingCheck, 0) AS followingCheck FROM board a LEFT JOIN likes b ON a.boardNo = b.boardNo AND b.memberNo = #{memberNo} LEFT JOIN member m ON a.memberNo = m.memberNo LEFT JOIN following f ON m.memberNo = f.memberNo AND f.followingMemberNo = #{memberNo} WHERE a.delYn = 'N' ORDER BY a.likeCnt DESC, a.boardNo DESC

select count(*) FROM following WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo} AND followingMemberNo = #{followingMemberNo}
mapper.update: update following set followingCheck = (case followingCheck when 1 then 0 else 1 end) where memberNo = #{memberNo} and followingMemberNo = #{followingMemberNo};
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(followingCheck, 0) AS followingCheck FROM following WHERE memberNo = #{0} AND followingMemberNo = #{1}
mapper.update: update board set delYn='Y' where boardNo=#{boardNo}
UPDATE hashTag SET tagCnt = tagCnt - 1 WHERE hashtagNo IN ( SELECT hashTagNo FROM board_hashtag WHERE boardNo = #{boardNo});
mapper.select: select * from likes l join member m On l.memberNo = m.memberNo where l.like_check = 1 and l.boardNo = #{0};

SELECT h.*, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(a.contentsImg ORDER BY RAND()), ',', 1) AS ContentsImg FROM hashTag h JOIN board_hashTag b ON h.hashTagNo = b.hashTagNo JOIN board a ON a.boardNo = b.boardNo WHERE h.tagCnt > 0 GROUP BY h.hashTagNo ORDER BY h.tagCnt DESC, h.hashTagNo DESC LIMIT 8;
